doc.title: Worth Killing For
doc.plot: Struggling actor Danny Perez wants to be in the spotlight. But when he takes a part time job to make ends meet, he gets more than he bargained for. Hired by the seductive Carla Cortex he quickly learns that the starring role she has in mind for him could get him killed. Lured into her web of desire and deceit, Danny is on a collision course with Carla's quick-tempered and suspicious husband Mario Cortez, a star of a different sort, a professional hit man. Now, cast in the middle, Danny must decide what his part in the passion is worth. Should he tell Carla to find some other leading man for her plot, or is she worth killing for?
